snippet: Clint Dempsey and Fabian Johnson were dropped from the United States roster for exhibition games at Scotland on Friday and Austria on Tuesday.
abstract: Clint Dempsey and Fabian Johnson are dropped from the United States soccer team roster for exhibition games at Scotland and Austria due to injury.
lead_paragraph: Clint Dempsey and Fabian Johnson were dropped from the United States roster for exhibition games at Scotland on Friday and Austria on Tuesday.

headline.main: Injuries Sideline Pair of U.S. Soccer Players
